summary: i\\\'m decorating skyrim for christmas, by adding christmas trees in appropriate places and putting wreaths on the doors of inns. Probably decorate player houses as well eventually. I\\\'m aware there are similar mods, this is just something i\\\'m doing out of boredom.
descriptionHtml:
Also on Steam Workshop - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=111264572

Now with Snowberry wreath \'tinsel\'

UPDATE - Actors near the christmas trees in and outside the blue palace in solitude are placed and move a bit awkwardly until they\'re in their new \'correct\' places, i\'m guessing this is because the game needs time to \"refresh\" the locations of them

I\'m decorating skyrim for christmas, by adding christmas trees in appropriate places and putting wreaths on the doors of inns. Probably decorate player houses as well eventually. I\'m aware there are similar mods, this is just something i\'m doing out of boredom.

Markarth - DONE
Riften - DONE
Solitude - DONE
Whiterun - DONE
Windhelm - DONE

Dawnstar
Falkreath
Morthal
Winterhold

Dragon Bridge
High Hrothgar
Ivarstead
Karthwasten
Riverwood
Rorikstead
Shor\'s Stone
author: me
